articles.title: Tesla slashes prices in China, other Asian markets as sales stumble - Reuters
articles.description: Tesla (TSLA.O) cut prices in China for the second time in less than three months on Friday, fuelling forecasts of a wider price war amid weaker demand in the world's largest autos market.

articles.title: With few entry tests, Southeast Asia may gain most from China's travel revival - Reuters
articles.description: Southeast Asia's tourist economies are set to be leading beneficiaries of China's scrapping of travel bans as they have steered clear of the COVID-19 tests before entry that Europe, Japan and the United States have imposed on Chinese visitors.
